content: HDI-S Drop-in anchor High-performance manual-set drop in anchor (carbon steel) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Drop-in anchor with speed thread specially designed to accept coil rods Drill bit, manual setting tool and anchor form a matched system to provide reliable coil rod anchoring Part of a matched tolerance system for reliable fastenings Applications Temporary concrete forming applications, i.e. bridge, highway, tunnel, subway construction and repair Anchoring in solid concrete, hard stone and solid block ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals / Test reports: N/A Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Base materials: Concrete (uncracked) Technical Data | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Base materials | Concrete (uncracked) | PROFIS Software | No ### ITEMS- 336931 - Drop-in anchor HDI-S 1/2 - Package Size 50 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDI-S 1/2 Anchor body - 337858 - Drop-in anchor HDI-S 1/2 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 300x HDI-S 1/2 Anchor body - 336932 - Drop-in anchor HDI-S 3/4 - Package Size 25 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDI-S 3/4 Anchor body
